summary: Check out the new version of this mod "Dread Prison".
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#bd0000]Please download the new version of this mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54535/?]Dread Prison[/url]. It is an overhauled version that will be maintained and updated. Thank you.[/color][/size][/center]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Summary:[/color][/size]
[size=3]Welcome to the Prison of Despair. Having trouble with bandits, Jarls, Imperials, Stormcloaks, guards, or anyone else in Skyrim? You can now send them to your own private prison to rot behind bars forever. Besides being able to send anyone to prison, you can host battles in the arena and watch as your prisoners suffer for survival.
The prison is located south of Solitude. (See picture)
Inspired by the Oblivion mod "Carcernus Prison".[/size]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Features:[/color][/size]
[size=3]-Cell Block
-Arena
-Torture Chamber
-Guard Barracks
-Warden's Office
-Spells[/size]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Spells:[/color][/size]
[size=3]-Prison Teleport Spell
-Arena Teleport Spell
-Dragon Pit Teleport Spell
-22 Arrest Spells
-8 Arena Spells
-6 Holding Cell Spells
-6 Cage Spells
-4 Dragon Pit Spells
-Free Prisoner Spell
-Remove Items Spell
-A Few Others[/size]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Cell Block:[/color][/size]
[size=3]The cell block has 22 cells where you can imprison anyone you want. There will be a spell tome in-front of each cell. You can use these spells to arrest anyone to the corresponding cell.[/size]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Arena:[/color][/size]
[size=3]In The Arena You Will Find 8 Spell Tomes. There Is One Spell For Each Arena Cage. Using These Spells On Anyone In Skyrim Will Send Them To The Corresponding Arena Cage. Prisoners In Each Cage Will Be Friendly With Each Other But Enemies With Prisoners In Every Other Cage. This Gives You The Ability To Host Many Different Types Of Battles. Individuals, Teams, Anything You Want To Do. You Can Also Trigger Traps That Are Set Up In The Arena And Spawn 4 Types Of Enemies To Add To The Battle. Giants, Dwarven Spheres, Dwarven Spiders, And Death Soldiers.[/size]

[size=4][color=#bd0000]Add-ons:[/color][/size]
[size=3]Add-on 1-City Prisons-Adds prison cells to each city where you can send even more people to rot behind bars. There is a new prison in each hold located through a trapdoor in the hold's jail. You can find a barrel with a key to these cells and the arrest spells for these cells in a barrel on the left of the breezehome in Whiterun.
Add-on 3-Cell Block 2-Adds 24 more cells for those of you who want more room to put prisoners.[/size]

[center][color=#bd0000][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=3]Oaristys and Tony67-Modders Resource Pack[/size][/center][size=3]
[center]cancrena-Daedric Armor and Weapons Glow Replacer[/center]
[center]Gizmodian-Real Silver Swords[/center]
[center]lautasantenni-Treasure Crafting[/center]
[/size][center][size=3]InsanitySorrow-Insanitys Goldbrand[/size][/center]
